contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=August 2009}} [[File:Map.Yasaka-Vill.Nagano.PNG|thumb|Map of Yasaka, Nagano]] {{nihongo|'''Yasaka'''|八坂村|Yasaka-mura}} was a [[villages of Japan|village]] located in [[Kitaazumi District, Nagano|Kitaazumi District]], [[Nagano Prefecture|Nagano]], [[Japan]]. On January 1, 2006 Yasaka, along with the village of [[Miasa, Nagano|Miasa]], also from [[Kitaazumi District, Nagano|Kitaazumi District]], was merged into the city of [[Ōmachi, Nagano|Ōmachi]]. As of 2003, the village had an estimated [[population]] of 1,199 and a [[population density|density]] of 35.33 persons per km². The total area was 33.94 km². [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Nagano Prefecture]] {{Nagano-geo-stub}}
